attributes.action: Unite UK people for Free Trade and Easy Travel, without Political Union
attributes.additional_details:
Must go for world free trade - starting with the Commonwealth of Nations, as soon as free of EU regulation, ready to reinstate trading links we reduced in the 1970's
European leaders need to recognise what British people want, is what most people in Europe want, have the dignity to let go of their pride, hurt feelings to make Europe a family of free trading nations.
So lets be really positive, and make sure the leaders of Britain, Europe and the rest of the world know what we, the people want.
attributes.background:
EU referendum not clear cut 
37.4% Leave
34.7% Remain
0.1% Spoiled
27.8% did not vote
Want European relationship as voted in 1975 as Family of Nations, including free trade, easy travel, mutual healthcare when travelling etc
But NO political union stifling regulation or bloated bureaucracy.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
